snippet: At the same time the New York City marathon would have started Sunday morning, a ferry filled with volunteers pulled into Staten Island. More than a thousand would-be marathoners were on board.
abstract: At the same time the New York City marathon would have started Sunday morning, a ferry filled with volunteers pulled into Staten Island. More than a thousand would-be marathoners were on board.
lead_paragraph: At the same time the New York City marathon would have started Sunday morning, a ferry filled with volunteers pulled into Staten Island. More than a thousand would-be marathoners were on board.

headline.main: Trying to Manage a Running Herd of Helpers
